resources.string: Espresso poured on a vanilla ice cream. Served in a cappuccino cup.

Espresso with added hot water 100-150 ml. Often served in a cappuccino cup. The espresso is added into the hot water rather than all the water being flowed through the coffee which would lead to over extraction.
A tall mild milk coffee about 150-300 ml. Espresso with steamed milk and a little milk foam on top. Serve in a latte glass or a coffee cup. Flavored syrup can be added.
A classic coffee made with equal parts espresso and steamed milk, topped with milk foam.
Chocolate-flavored coffee drink made with espresso, steamed milk, and cocoa/syrup.
